DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To compare efficacy use mild ovarian stimulation protocol conventional stimulation protocol IVF outcome . Design : Prospective randomize trial Setting : University IVF set . Patient ( ) : The study compromise total 200 subinfertile couple woman regulary menstruation . Intervention ( ) : Patients randomize treatment clomiphene citrate , gonadotropin GnRH antagonist ( 100 patient ) GnRH agonist gonadotropin ( 100 patient ) . Main outcome measure : Clinical pregnancy rate . Key Words : clomiphene citrate , GnRH agonist , GnRH antagonist , vitro fertilization , pregnancy rate .
DOC.brief_title: Clomiphene Citrate ( CC ) /Gonadotropin/Gonadotropin Releasing Hormone ( GnRH ) Antagonist Versus Gonadotropin/GnRH Agonist
DOC.criteria: female patient age 1835 year , presence regular proven ovulatory menstruation cycle length 2635 day basal FSH < 10 IU/L body mass index ( BMI ) 1830 ( kg/mÂ² ) Indication IVF unexplained infertility , mild male factor , tubal factor , early stage endometriosis cervical factor patient require ICSI
